---
title: "MyRepository"
---

This is a Quarto website to document this repository.

Quarto is multiformat document generator that can be used as
a static website generator. It is more powerful that a 
blog-oriented platform such as Jekyll, but less than
documentation-oriented tools like Sphinx or Docusaurus.
It is build on [Pandoc](https://pandoc.org) and accepts 
multiple flavours of markdown.

To learn more about Quarto websites visit <https://quarto.org/docs/websites>.
